translations: 断言，证实； 宣称拥护，支持；认可（判决，协议），批准；不宣誓而提供正式证词；给予（某人）情感支持（或鼓励）

sentences.sentence: I can affirm that no one will lose their job.
sentences.translation: 我可以肯定，谁都不会丢掉工作。

sentences.sentence: In my opinion, in the appraisal of migrant workers, it is one-sided to affirm everything or to negate everything.
sentences.translation: 在我看来，对农民工的评价中，肯定一切或否定一切都是片面的。

sentences.sentence: Everything I had accomplished seemed to affirm that opinion.
sentences.translation: 我所做成的每件事似乎都证实了那个观点。
